name: Change pixivpy to pixivpy3, remove python2 support
body:
1. change pixivpy to pixivpy3
2. Remove python2 supports

name: Due to 403 when login, bypass CF by cloudscraper
Add backup DNS for bapi host address resolution
Add ByPassSniApi() for bypass the GFW, fix requirement for project
Support set_additional_headers() for user headers settings
body: Merge ed5f8fe5 into master, add new api set_accept_language() for tags.translated_name

name: Change illust_related() to v2 endpoint
body: New parse_qs() to process seed_illust_ids[] liked params, it return an array like PHP url_parse

name: New AppPixivAPI() can call without auth (Experimental)
Add write API for favorite an user/illust
release pixivpy3
body:
1. New Search API for pixiv text/tags search
2. Remove old SAPI form project

name: Final pixivpy2
body: The latest stable release of pixivpy2 (SAPI/Public-API)
